content: keito s tote bag doll clothes july20 2021 this pattern is sized to fit the body of knit doll keito keito s body size height 37cm to the toes bust 18cm waist 13cm hips 18cm foot 3 5cm 5 depths about me my english is not perfect please refer to the post on my website to help you when knitting my pattern i hope you enjoy my pattern keito s tote bag web pattern 1 / 3 ©2021 nioknits keito s tote bag doll clothes july20 2021 materials ◆yarn fingering weight yarn yarn used in this pattern junmo-chuboso/pierrot yarns japan 40%merino wool 60%wool gauge 27stitches 35rows/10cm 2 7~3 3mm needle amount of yarn i actually used deepest size 6g/25m ◆leather for the handle finish with glue two 6mm/width × 11cm/length finish with a slipknot method two 3mm/width × 20cm/length hook ◇size 2mm others ◇tapestry needle ◇scissors ◇glue for leather abbreviations begin end chain slip_stitch slip_stitch insert the hook under the chain not in the hole in the chain single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet decrease pattern notes i posted the explanation up to round 5 on the blog with photos so please refer to it keito s tote bag/knitting guide after 5 rounds knit to the desired depth and then knit the rim and handles for leather handles knit up to the rim and attach the handles to the eyelet leather is fixed with glue or tied with a slipknot method slipknot method/guide round1 begins with the circular cast on method and chart1 round2 chart2 round3 chart3 round4 chart4 round5 chart5 from here add rounds 6-9 as needed round6 repeat chart5 round7 repeat chart5 round8 repeat chart5 round9 repeat chart5 chart rim round chart chain handle round 2 / 3 ©2021 nioknits keito s tote bag doll clothes july20 2021 leather handle 25 chains chain handle round rim round 5 4 3 2 1 25 chains leather handle 3 / 3 ©2021 nioknits
